scripts.build: npm run pre && ng build -c prod
scripts.pre: typst compile assets/resume.typ assets/bruno-roque-resume.pdf && node assets/main.js
scripts.start: npm run pre && ng serve -c dev
scripts.up: npm run build; gh-pages --branch deploy --dist dist/browser --no-history --repo https://github.com/brunoroque06/brunoroque06.github.io.git
scripts.watch: npm run pre && ng build --watch -c dev
